name: Corridor (darnok333)
description:
Created for the IGU Summer Jam 2022 (from August 18 to August 29).

You are locked in a corridor, zombies are coming !

Stay alive as long as possible, and kill them all !!!

[CONTROL] :

Left Mouse, Shoot

R, reload

[TIPS] :

Two flame thrower are hidden, do enough headshot to unlock them.

[ASSETS USED] :

Font:

https://www.dafont.com/fr/zombie.font
